name: node-typescript-koa-typeorm-api-boilerplate
description: Basic boilerplate for Node.js development with TypeScript, Koa, koa-router, koa-helmet, @koa/cors, koa-bodyparser, koa-requestid, ESLint, Prettier, Airbnb styleguide, Mocha, Chai, supertest, sinon.js, istanbul, pino, tsc-watch

scripts.start:dev: RDB_USER='user' RDB_PASS='' tsc-watch --onSuccess 'node --inspect=0.0.0.0:5858 dist/src/index.js' | pino-pretty -t 'SYS:HH:MM:ss' -i hostname
scripts.test: RDB_USER='user' RDB_PASS='' npm run build && mocha --require ts-node/register --require source-map-support/register --recursive dist/test
scripts.test:unit: RDB_USER='user' RDB_PASS='' npm run build && mocha --require ts-node/register --require source-map-support/register --recursive dist/test/unit
scripts.test:integration: RDB_USER='user' RDB_PASS='' npm run build && mocha --require ts-node/register --require source-map-support/register --recursive dist/test/integration
scripts.test:coverage: RDB_USER='user' RDB_PASS='' npm run build && nyc mocha --require ts-node/register --require source-map-support/register --recursive dist/test
scripts.test:coverage:unit: RDB_USER='user' RDB_PASS='' npm run build && nyc mocha --require ts-node/register --require source-map-support/register --recursive dist/test/unit
scripts.test:coverage:integration: RDB_USER='user' RDB_PASS='' npm run build && nyc mocha --require ts-node/register --require source-map-support/register --recursive dist/test/integration
